716766f-a.title: Manhattan: Bowery - Delancey Street
716766f-a.text:
169-163 Bewery, east side, south of Delancey Strcet, showing Miner's
Bowery Theatre,(165-167) which was known around 1990, as the Royal Theatre.
Also seen is the Third Ave., Elevated Lines.
About 1890.
International News Photos.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
The theatre after falling into disrepair was demolished around 1934
and has been replaced by a business structure since. The New York Sun
of May 6, 1938, in a list of demolitions reports that the 5-story
building (No. 163) adjoining same on the right, is to have its complete
front altered.
